name: Coinsence
description: A global decentral collaboration platform and change-maker network powered by blockchain based impact currencies

SDGs.evidenceText: Through alternatives for funding and value sharing based on crypto assets, we are building a new way how communities can share profit within the ecosystem (with contributors and well as with customers).

Through our solution communities are building decentral governance frameworks that create the possibility for people and organization to collaborate e.g. based on democratic consensus. Through creating new digital ways for voting and policy making across different groups, regional and national borders, we can foster peace and justice and build alternatives to some todays non-functioning institutions.

Through our platform, where people and organizations across the globe can collaborate, share resources and manage funds in a decentralized way, and where stakeholders are rewarding through crypto assets for their contributions, we are encouraging, facilitating and boosting partnerships between the different organizations, sectors and regions.

repositories.name: Coinsence project monorepo - includes our smart contracts
